paper.title: TIME-INCONSISTENT MARKOVIAN CONTROL PROBLEMS UNDER MODEL UNCERTAINTY WITH APPLICATION TO THE MEAN-VARIANCE PORTFOLIO SELECTION
paper.abstract: In this paper, we study a class of time-inconsistent terminal Markovian control problems in discrete time subject to model uncertainty. We combine the concept of the sub-game perfect strategies with the adaptive robust stochastic control method to tackle the theoretical aspects of the considered stochastic control problem. Consequently, as an important application of the theoretical results and by applying a machine learning algorithm we solve numerically the mean-variance portfolio selection problem under the model uncertainty.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心应用是解决均值-方差投资组合选择问题，这直接属于投资组合管理领域。论文结合了时间不一致的马尔可夫控制问题和模型不确定性，并应用机器学习算法进行数值求解，这些都是为了优化投资组合的选择。
